name: oneuptime
description: OneUptime is a complete open-source monitoring and status page service. It provides uptime, workflow tracking, alerts, SLOs, and on-call management for self-hosted or SaaS deployment.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Check website and API availability with HTTP, TCP, and ping monitors from multiple locations

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications via email, SMS, Slack, or webhooks when monitors detect issues or recover

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Manage rotation schedules and escalation policies for incident response teams

features.title: Incident Management
features.description: Track issues from detection through resolution with timeline, notes, and team collaboration

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Collect and visualize response times, uptime percentages, and availability trends over time

features.title: Api Monitoring
features.description: Test API endpoints with custom headers, authentication, and response validation for comprehensive checks
